Translations.Text: main un (moortiyon) ko nahin poojata, jinhen tum poojate ho
aur na tum use poojate ho, jise main poojata hoon
aur na main use poojoonga, jise tum poojate ho
aur na tum use poojoge, jise main poojata hoon
tumhaare lie tamhaara dharm tatha mere lie mera dharm hai
(he nabee!) jab allaah kee sahaayata evan vijay aa jaaye
aur tum logon ko allaah ke dharm mein dal ke dal pravesh karate dekh lo
to apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath usakee pavitrata ka varnan karo aur usase kshama maango, nihsandeh vah bada kshamee hai
aboo lahab ke donon haath naash ho gaye aur vah svayan bhee naash ho gaya
usaka dhan tatha jo usane kamaaya usake kaam nahin aaya
vah sheeghr laava phenkatee aag mein jaayega
tatha usakee patnee bhee, jo eendhan lie phiratee hai
usakee gardan mein moonj kee rassee hogee
